Data:
==Applies To==

* PCI DSS Requirement 10.5.2

==Policy Statement==

Protect the log files from unauthorized modification.

==Policy Purpose==

Protect the log files from unauthorized modification to prevent attackers from editing the logs to hide the details of a compromise.

==Related Guidance==

* [[1ac7d033-1666-431e-8de9-98f74aa68fb3|Protect the Log Files]]

==Related Checklist Items==

* [[ee19ddfb-eccf-4f3e-90a6-331d5586574c|Log Files Are Protected]]
